/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network of lines against the sky.

The sky itself is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The trees lining the street are lush and green, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape.

The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective. It's as if you're standing at the edge of the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The overall effect is a dynamic and vibrant snapshot of life in Beijing.
